titles.title: National Center for Bioengineering Research Act
To amend title IV of the Public Health Service Act to establish a National Center for Bioengineering Research.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 6/25/1998--Introduced. National Center for Bioengineering Research Act - Establishes a National Center for Bioengineering Research within the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute to: (1) promote basic research in bioengineering; and (2) establish an office to enhance and improve coordination of bioengineering research conducted within the National Institutes of Health and throughout the Federal Government. Authorizes appropriations.
